name: Makesweat
author: makesweat

sections.description:
Makesweat.com allows a sports club to quickly list upcoming training sessions and club events, and features a fully integrated payment platform for paid events.

This plugin enables a number of WordPress shortcodes, making it super simple to display your Makesweat events on your WordPress site.

Sports clubs will typically create an entire website using WordPress, and separately use Makesweat for their training session organisation, booking and payment. The purpose of this plugin is to allow a Makesweat events to be displayed on their WordPress site.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/makesweat directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Add shortcodes to your pages or posts to include Makesweat contents. The only supported shortcode in this release is [makesweat_upcoming club=”clubid”] . Go to makesweat.com to find your club ID and make sure to insert it in this link.
sections.faq:
Whatismakesweat.com has a full FAQ, please refer there.

Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/makesweat directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Add shortcodes to your pages or posts to include Makesweat contents. The only supported shortcode in this release is [makesweat_upcoming club=”clubid”] . Go to makesweat.com to find your club ID and make sure to insert it in this link.
sections.changelog:
0.1

Initial release, supporting the makesweat_incoming shortcode. At this time the club parameter is required. Future releases will allow the club to be configured within the WordPress admin area.
